content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":11351,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/c76cd0c8-a733-46f3-bb0b-8f0491a5c715/MicrosoftTeams-image (60).png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/c76cd0c8-a733-46f3-bb0b-8f0491a5c715/MicrosoftTeams-image (60).png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"MicrosoftTeams-image (60).png\",\"name\":\"MicrosoftTeams-image (60).png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"subtypeSuffix\":null,\"charset\":null,\"concrete\":true},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"c76cd0c8-a733-46f3-bb0b-8f0491a5c715\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":450,\"height\":132},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Well-being in remote work \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Perhaps some of you have already worked remotely, for some - it is a new experience.  \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We would like to share some tips regarding working and communicating in remote since we are confident that the proper organization of your workday will help to create your own dream work-life balance. Follow this \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMLND/Culture+of+Well-Being\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"link\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and read about well-being in your location. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":200299,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/bf5ce07c-42cb-4f6d-9ee9-6070749606c4/Picture11.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/bf5ce07c-42cb-4f6d-9ee9-6070749606c4/Picture11.jpg?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture11.jpg\",\"name\":\"Picture11.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"subtypeSuffix\":null,\"charset\":null,\"concrete\":true},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"bf5ce07c-42cb-4f6d-9ee9-6070749606c4\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":776,\"height\":724},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
